intro: Lyperia tenuifolia, commonly known as the slender leaf lyperia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Amaryllidaceae and is characterized by its narrow, grass-like leaves and clusters of small, bell-shaped flowers. Due to its unique appearance and ornamental value, it is sometimes cultivated in gardens.
